anathema: Bully a competitor; deny a worthy victor their celebration or reward; cheat at a competition, contest, game, or sport
edict: Celebrate success, compete honorably, strive for victory, show pride in your accomplishments
markdown:
<title level="1" right="Deity " pfs="Standard">[Marishi (The Festival Queen)](/Deities.aspx?ID=650)</title>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

<traits>

</traits>

**Source** [Divine Mysteries Web Supplement](/Sources.aspx?ID=237) pg. 12

_Nethys Note: no description has been provided of this deity_

<column gap="tiny">

**Category** [Empyreal Lords](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=10)

**Edicts** Celebrate success, compete honorably, strive for victory, show pride in your accomplishments

**Anathema** Bully a competitor; deny a worthy victor their celebration or reward; cheat at a competition, contest, game, or sport

**Area of Concern**
Celebration, contests, sport

</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
<title level="2">Devotee Benefits</title>

<column gap="tiny">

**[Divine Attribute](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=132)**
Strength or Charisma

**Divine Font** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148)

**Divine Sanctification** can choose holy

**Divine Skill** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36)

**Favored Weapon** [Spiked Gauntlet](/Weapons.aspx?ID=366)

**Domains** [Ambition](/Domains.aspx?ID=64), [Confidence](/Domains.aspx?ID=67), [Freedom](/Domains.aspx?ID=77), [Might](/Domains.aspx?ID=83)

**[Alternate Domains](/Rules.aspx?ID=802)** [Indulgence](/Domains.aspx?ID=79), [Zeal](/Domains.aspx?ID=100)

**Cleric Spells**

- **1st**
[Tailwind](/Spells.aspx?ID=1711)

- **3rd**
[Roaring Applause](/Spells.aspx?ID=987)

- **4th**
[Winning Streak](/Spells.aspx?ID=1034)

</column>
name: Marishi (The Festival Queen)
